name: Breakout (itch) (alexcrowe)
description:
Breakout Clone !!! PLAY IN FULL SCREEN OR IT WONT WORK !!!

Use the mouse to move the platform and destory the bricks with the ball.

The aim is to destroy all of the brick on each level.

Blue bricks = 1 Hit 100 Points

Red bricks =2 Hits 200 Points

Yellow bricks = 3 Hits 300 Points
